name: GUM GUM Diable Three Sword Style Mouton JET Six Hundred Pound Cannon

trigger.text: If you have a cost 8 or greater character in play, KO up to one of your opponents cost 5 or lower characters.

text: Main: Give your leader or up to one of your characters +3000 power for this turn. Then, if you have a cost 8 or greater character in play, KO up to one of your opponents cost 2 or less characters. Trigger: If you have a cost 8 or greater character in play, KO up to one of your opponents cost 5 or lower characters.

effect.text: Give your leader or up to one of your characters +3000 power for this turn.
If you have a cost 8 or greater character in play, KO up to one of your opponents cost 2 or less characters.
If you have a cost 8 or greater character in play, KO up to one of your opponents cost 5 or lower characters.
